definitions.title: break, snap
definitions.body: (supposed to be akin to Ar. qat.=un cut, cut off, pare, trim [whence Buhl assumes √ [[קטט]]]), to account for [[יְקוֹט]] Job 8:14, either as

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. whose hope snappeth; or as

definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: = fragile thing (‖[[בֵּית עַכָּבִישׁ ]]; cf. Di Bu); prob. crpt.; Du Beer rd. [[קוּרִים]] Bu conj. [[קֻרֵי קַיִט]] [Aramaism for [[קַיִץ]] ´[[ק]]:].
